duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure the prompt recognition and seating of all guests in outlets as assigned.
Assist the servers in providing attentive courteous and efficient service to guests throughout their dining experience.
Assist the cashier in the collection of payment for all guest transactions.
Approach all encounters with guests and employees in a friendly service-oriented manner.
Maintain high standards of personal appearance and grooming.
Comply with certification requirements as required for position to include Food Handlers, Alcohol Awareness, Safety, etc.
Greet and seat guests at appropriate tables in a timely manner.
Assist in providing a pleasant dining experience to guests.
Assist cashier in collection of money or credit cards.
Ensure quality control of menus with regard to cleanliness and appearance.
Perform opening and closing duties according to established side work checklist.
Answer the telephone according to standards.
Have a complete knowledge of standards of service for receiving a room service order.
Know and understand the state liquor laws.
Perform other duties as requested by management.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma and/or experience in a hotel or a related field preferred.
